wikipedia_page.main: Jamie Vincent Junior Reckord (born 9 March 1992) is an English footballer who plays as a full back for Boreham Wood. He started his career at Wolverhampton Wanderers and during his time there had spells on loan with Northampton Town, Scunthorpe United, Coventry City, Plymouth Argyle and Swindon Town.
